alert.note: Alert for Grant (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 6:39AM CDT until June 10 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by previous excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Kansas, including the following counties, Grant and Stanton. * WHEN...Until 630 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 638 AM CDT, the public reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Several county roads in Stanton county are closed and Bear Creek is reported to be around a mile wide. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northwestern Grant and Northeastern Stanton Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
